name: Worms Soundboard
description:
“HELLO!” - From Team17 Software Ltd., the creators of the best-selling Worms™ series comes the official, and FREE, Worms™ Soundboard App.

“THAT’S AMAZING!” - Get in the mood for cartoon-based carnage with some hilarious and anarchic Worms™ catchphrases, taunts and exclamations from some of the best all-time Worms™ games.

“YOU MISSED!” -The Worms™ Soundboard also features a variety of sound effects from the crazy turn-based-strategy blast-a-thons, such as the Super Sheep’s fanfare, the Holy Hand Grenade’s rousing ‘Hallelujah’, and the sweet sounds of the Concrete Donkey. Brace yourself, grab a grenade (or even a bazooka!) and prepare for battle with the official Worms™ Soundboard.

“INCOMING!” - Get even more Team17 information, including the latest game updates and more…

VISIT US: www.team.17.com
FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/Team17Ltd
LIKE US: www.facebook.com/WormsTeam17
WATCH US: www.youtube.com/Team17SoftwareLtd

DON’T MISS OUR OTHER EXCITING GAMES! Worms 3, Worms Crazy Golf, Worms 2 Armageddon, Worms, Worms HD, Worms Crazy Golf HD, Alien Breed
